analyzeResult.content:
CURRICULUM VITAE
PERSONAL DATA
Name :
Daniel J. Goldman
Born:
May 22, 1953, Chicago, Illinois
Social Security Number: 327-46-2139
EDUCATION
Undergraduate: University of Illinois, Urbana, 1971-1975, B.S. (Biochemistry) Graduate/Professional: Brandeis University, Waltham, Massachusetts, 1975-1978,
(Biochemistry); University of Illinois, Urbana, 1980-1983, Ph.D. (Biochemistry)
POSTDOCTORAL TRAINING
Postdoctoral Research, Salk Institute, Laboratory of Dr. Heinemann, 9/83-9/86.
ACADEMIC APPOINTMENTS
Assistant Professor, Department of Biological Chemistry, 9/86 - present. Assistant Research Scientist, Mental Health Research Institute, University of Michigan, 9/86 - present.
Associate Professor, Department of Biological Chemistry, 9/92 - present. Associate Research Scientist, Mental Health Research Institute, University of Michigan, 9/92 - present.
BIBLIOGRAPHY
Peer Reviewed (selected)
1. Goldman, D., Boulter, J., Heinemann, S. and Patrick, J .: Muscle denervation increases the levels of two mRNA's coding for the acetylcholine receptor alpha- subunit. J Neurosci 1985; 5:2553-2558.
2. Boulter, J., Luyten, W., Evans, K., Mason, P., Ballivet, M., Goldman, D., Stengelin, S., Martin, G., Heinemann, S. and Patrick, J .: Isolation of a clone coding for the alpha subunit of a mouse acetylcholine receptor. J Neurosci 1985; 5:2545-2552.
3. Boulter, J., Evans, K., Goldman, D., Martin, G., Treco, D., Heinemann, S. and Patrick, J .: Isolation of a cDNA clone coding for a possible neural nicotinic acetylcholine receptor a-subunit. Nature 1986; 319:368-374.
4. Goldman, D., Simmon, D., Swanson, L.W., Patrick, J. and Heinemann, S .: Mapping brain areas expressing RNA homologous to two different acetylcholine receptor a- subunit cDNAs. Proc Natl Acad Sci USA 1986; 83:4076-4080.
5. Boulter, J., Evans, K., Martin, G., Mason, P., Stengelin, S., Goldman, D., Heinemann, S. and Patrick, J .: Isolation and sequence of cDNA clones coding for the precursor to the Y-subunit of mouse muscle acetylcholine receptor. J of Neurosci Res 1986; 16:37-49.
6. Evans, S., Goldman, D., Patrick, J. and Heinemann, S .: Gene regulation of acetylcholine receptor subunits. J Biol Chem 1987; 262:4911-4916.
7. Goldman, D., Deneris, E., Kochhar, A., Patrick, J. and Heinemann, S .: Members of a nicotinic acetylcholine receptor gene family are expressed in different regions of the mammalian central nervous system. Cell 1987; 48:965-973.
